Class DOM4JUserAgent

java.lang.Object
io.sf.carte.doc.agent.AbstractUserAgent
io.sf.carte.doc.dom4j.DOM4JUserAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserAgent, UserAgent.AgentControl, Serializable
public class DOM4JUserAgent extends AbstractUserAgent
User Agent based on DOM4J document trees.

      Returns:
      the XHTMLDocument.
      Throws:
